answers.answer: Most doctors prefer you to have a planned c section after one, because there is more of a hemorrhaging risk, my son and daughter are 6 years apart, son was an emerg c section, second was planned because my dr didnt want to risk anything... im on my third and again planned c section due to not wanting to risk anything... my two daughters are going to be 18 months apart

I actually planned on having my kids 2 years apart. We had an unplanned c-section with my first, but my doctor is perfectly fine with me doing a trial vbac with this one. Tomorrow we will be 31 weeks and her opinion hasn't changed. I think it would be best to speak with your doctor and get their opinion on how long you (specifically you due to your pregnancy history) and what would be the healthiest and safest option for you and your future baby.

question: I miss being pregnant so much I was thinking about waiting a long time for another one but I think Ima try sooner I'm just scare to have preeclampsia again and have a c section :/ I wanted my babies to be 5 years apart but maybe it will be like two years apart I just feel so sad since I gave birth i miss her kicking my ribs lol
